text: geubun oee neohuiga sungbaehan geosdeul-eun neohuiwa neohui seonjoga ileum ppun-in geos-e bulgwahamyeo hananim-eun geugeos deul-eul wihae gwonhan-eul jujido ani haess-euni gwonneung-eun hananimkkeman issnola geubun-on myeonglyeonghasieo geubun oee da leun geos-eul gyeongbaehaji malla hasyeoss-eumae geugeos-i jinsildoen jong-gyola geuleona manh eun salam-i alji moshadeola
